title: Explicit Computations for Delayed Semistatic Hedging. (arXiv:2308.10550v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: In this work we consider the exponential utility maximization problem in the framework of semistatic hedging.

Title: Explicit Computations for Delayed Semistatic Hedging. (arXiv:2308.10550v1 [q-fin.MF])
Abstract: In this work we consider the exponential utility maximization problem in the framework of semistatic hedging.
translated_title: 延迟半静态对冲的明确计算
translated_abstract: 在这项工作中，我们考虑了在半静态对冲框架下的指数效用最大化问题。
